sentences.chinese: 平公恐懼，伏於廊屋之閒。
sentences.literal: Duke Ping fearful, prostrated in corridor house interval.
Jin state great drought, red earth three years.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：夫上古明王舉樂者，非以娛心自樂，快意恣欲，將欲為治也。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian says: Indeed high ancient enlightened kings raised music, not to amuse heart self-amuse, satisfy intention indulge desires, but wished to govern.

sentences.chinese: 正教者皆始於音，音正而行正。
sentences.literal: Correct teachings all begin from sound, sound correct and conduct correct.

sentences.chinese: 故音樂者，所以動蕩血脈，通流精神而和正心也。
sentences.literal: Therefore music is that which moves shakes blood vessels, flows through spirit and harmonizes corrects heart.

sentences.chinese: 故宮動脾而和正聖，商動肺而和正義，角動肝而和正仁，徵動心而和正禮，羽動腎而和正智。
sentences.literal: Therefore gong moves spleen and harmonizes corrects sagehood, shang moves lung and harmonizes corrects righteousness, jue moves liver and harmonizes corrects benevolence, zhi moves heart and harmonizes corrects ritual, yu moves kidney and harmonizes corrects wisdom.

sentences.chinese: 故樂所以內輔正心而外異貴賤也；
sentences.literal: Therefore music internally assists correct heart and externally distinguishes noble base;

sentences.chinese: 上以事宗廟，下以變化黎庶也。
sentences.literal: Above to serve ancestral temples, below to transform the black-haired people.
Zither length eight chi one cun, correct measure.

sentences.chinese: 弦大者為宮，而居中央，君也。
sentences.literal: String large one is gong, and dwells central, ruler.

sentences.chinese: 商張右傍，其餘大小相次，不失其次序，則君臣之位正矣。
sentences.literal: Shang stretches right side, remaining large small follow each other, not lose their sequence, then ruler minister positions correct.

sentences.chinese: 故聞宮音，使人溫舒而廣大；
sentences.literal: Therefore hearing gong sound, makes people warm comfortable and broad great;

sentences.chinese: 聞商音，使人方正而好義；
sentences.literal: Hearing shang sound, makes people square upright and love righteousness;
